statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id AS ID, customer_name AS Name, billing_amount AS 'Billing Amount' FROM customer_data WHERE billing_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, billing_amount FROM billing_info WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT billing_amount, payment_status FROM billing_info WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_status
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, billing_amount FROM customers JOIN billing_info ON customers.customer_id = billing_info.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, installation_date FROM solar_panels WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT billing_info.customer_id, bill_amount, due_date FROM billing_info JOIN customers ON billing_info.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM billing_info ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, bill_amount FROM customers c JOIN billing_info b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY installation_date;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.panel_type FROM customers c JOIN solar_panels p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.panel_type = 'Monocrystalline';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, panel_type, installed_date FROM solar_panels ORDER BY installed_date ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT payment_method, card_number FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT panel_type, installed_date FROM solar_panels WHERE customer_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT bill_id, order_id, amount, status FROM billing WHERE payment_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id LEFT JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
